title: Can't see any chat messages during champion select
body:
My entire team was having a conversation: http://i.imgur.com/uPjnW3c.jpg
But none of it was showing up on my end: http://i.imgur.com/ohWYkAY.jpg

I'm not sure if this has happened before and I just didn't notice it, but I did see chat earlier today (after patching) so it's not an every-lobby occurrence.  Has anyone else seen this before?

replies.body: Yeah, we saw it this morning too. Fix in progress. Thanks for testing the alpha!
